findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202):
	External calls:
	- safeRewardTokenTransfer(msg.sender,pending) (MasterChef.sol#1189)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,rewardTokenBal) (MasterChef.sol#1244)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1246)
	- pool.lpToken.safeTransferFrom(address(msg.sender),address(this),_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1191-1195)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- user.unstakeTime = now + unstakeFrozenTime (MasterChef.sol#1196)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)
	- MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235)
	- MasterChef.pendingRewardToken(uint256,address) (MasterChef.sol#1119-1143)
	- MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979)
	- MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224)
	- user.amount = user.amount.add(_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1197)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)
	- MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235)
	- MasterChef.pendingRewardToken(uint256,address) (MasterChef.sol#1119-1143)
	- MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979)
	- MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224)
	- user.rewardDebt = user.amount.mul(pool.accRewardTokenPerShare).div(1e12) (MasterChef.sol#1198-1200)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)
	- MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235)
	- MasterChef.pendingRewardToken(uint256,address) (MasterChef.sol#1119-1143)
	- MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979)
	- MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224):
	External calls:
	- safeRewardTokenTransfer(msg.sender,pending) (MasterChef.sol#1216)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,rewardTokenBal) (MasterChef.sol#1244)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1246)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)

	- user.rewardDebt = user.amount.mul(pool.accRewardTokenPerShare).div(1e12) (MasterChef.sol#1218-1220)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235):
	External calls:
	- pool.lpToken.safeTransfer(address(msg.sender),user.amount) (MasterChef.sol#1231)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- user.amount = 0 (MasterChef.sol#1233)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)
	- MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235)
	- MasterChef.pendingRewardToken(uint256,address) (MasterChef.sol#1119-1143)
	- MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979)
	- MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224)
	- user.rewardDebt = 0 (MasterChef.sol#1234)
	MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202)
	- MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1228-1235)
	- MasterChef.pendingRewardToken(uint256,address) (MasterChef.sol#1119-1143)
	- MasterChef.userInfo (MasterChef.sol#979)
	- MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
MasterChef.set(uint256,uint256,bool) (MasterChef.sol#1086-1098) should emit an event for: 
	- totalAllocPoint = totalAllocPoint.sub(poolInfo[_pid].allocPoint).add(_allocPoint) (MasterChef.sol#1094-1096)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
MasterChef.setStartRewardBlock(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1046-1048) should emit an event for:

MasterChef.setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1039-1044) should emit an event for:

findings.message:
MasterChef.setAll(IERC20,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1015-1029) should emit an event for: 
	- rewardTokenPerBlock = _rewardTokenPerBlock (MasterChef.sol#1024) 
	- startRewardBlock = _startRewardBlock (MasterChef.sol#1025) 
	- endRewardBlock = _endRewardBlock (MasterChef.sol#1026) 
	- bonusEndBlock = _bonusEndBlock (MasterChef.sol#1027)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message: MasterChef.updatePool(uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1154-1175) has external calls inside a loop: lpSupply = pool.lpToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (MasterChef.sol#1159)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202):
	External calls:
	- safeRewardTokenTransfer(msg.sender,pending) (MasterChef.sol#1189)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,rewardTokenBal) (MasterChef.sol#1244)
		- rewardToken.transfer(_to,_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1246)
	- pool.lpToken.safeTransferFrom(address(msg.sender),address(this),_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1191-1195)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deposit(msg.sender,_pid,_amount) (MasterChef.sol#1201)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
MasterChef.deposit(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1179-1202) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now > user.unstakeTime (MasterChef.sol#1188)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256) (MasterChef.sol#1205-1224) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now > user.unstakeTime (MasterChef.sol#1210)
findings.name: timestamp
